ai-snp5.4:1.1_0: “Having given up the root of all things, I am the one who is unmoved,
ai-snp5.4:1.3_0: There is a question that should be answered,
ai-snp5.4:1.4_0: On account of what did the seers and men,
ai-snp5.4:1.5_0: nobles, and brahmins, here in the world,
ai-snp5.4:1.6_0: offered many sacrifices to the gods,
ai-snp5.4:1.7_0: I ask you, Fortunate One, please tell this to me.”
ai-snp5.4:2.3_0: nobles, and brahmins, here in the world,
ai-snp5.4:2.4_0: offered many sacrifices to the gods,
ai-snp5.4:2.5_0: being full of value, having complete purity,
ai-snp5.4:3.3_0: nobles, and brahmins, here in the world,
ai-snp5.4:3.4_0: offered many sacrifices to the gods,
ai-snp5.4:3.5_0: Fortunate One, I hope you’re diligent in your sacrifice,
ai-snp5.4:3.6_0: has crushed out birth and old age, dear Sir!
ai-snp5.4:3.7_0: I ask you, Fortunate One, please tell this to me.”
ai-snp5.4:4.1_0: “They are the’s lion, they strike a fire and fire,
ai-snp5.4:4.3_0: They hunger for sense pleasures, because of gain
ai-snp5.4:4.4_0: they engage in sacrifice, excited by the passion for existence.
ai-snp5.4:4.5_0: they have not crossed over birth and old age, I say.”
ai-snp5.4:5.1_0: “If those who have not crossed over
ai-snp5.4:5.3_0: birth and old age by their sacrifices, dear Sir,
ai-snp5.4:5.4_0: then just who in the world of the Gods and men
ai-snp5.4:5.5_0: has crossed over birth and old age, dear Sir?
ai-snp5.4:5.6_0: I ask you, Fortunate One, please tell this to me.”
ai-snp5.4:6.3_0: He has no agitation in the world.
ai-snp5.4:6.4_0: Peaceful, unclouded, untroubled, with no need for hope,
ai-snp5.4:6.5_0: they’ve crossed over birth and old age, I declare.”
ai-snp5.4:6.6_0: The third asking of the Sakyans
